uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.util

Class CHierarchy

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.util.CHierarchy

  • public class CHierarchy
extends java.lang.Object
    Light-weight representation of the hierarchical relationships in a CFrame-hierarchy, with frames being specified solely by the relevant CIdentity objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CHierarchy(CFrame rootFrame)
      Constructs representation of hierarchy under the specified root-frame (which is not necessarily the root-frame of the entire frame-hierarchy for the relevat model).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Object> getAnnotationKeys(CIdentity frameId)
      Provides the keys for all annotations on the specified frame.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getAnnotationValues(CIdentity frameId, java.lang.Object key)
      Provides all values of the specified annotation on the specified frame.
      CIdentity getRootFrameId()
      Provides the identity of the root-frame
      java.util.List<CIdentity> getSubFrameIds(CIdentity frameId)
      Provides the identities of all sub-frames of the specified frame.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getSubFrameIds

        public java.util.List<CIdentity> getSubFrameIds(CIdentity frameId)
        Provides the identities of all sub-frames of the specified frame.
        Parameters:
        frameId - Identity of relevant frame
        Returns:
        Identities of all sub-frames of specified frame
        Throws:
        KAccessException - if specified frame not present in hierarchy

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • getAnnotationValues

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getAnnotationValues(CIdentity frameId,
                                                            java.lang.Object key)
        Provides all values of the specified annotation on the specified frame.
        Parameters:

        key - Key for relevant annotation
        Returns:
